about_the_game:
On July 2nd, 1937 the U.S. Coast Guard cutter Itasca received the last recorded words of Amelia Earhart. She was never seen or heard of again. Her Lockheed E-10 was lost with her. No wreckage or any fragments were ever found despite a 250,000 square mile search the size of Texas being conducted by the United States Navy.
On July 2nd 1937, Amelia Earhart and her plane disappeared forever.

“We are on the line 157-337 flying north and south.”



Assuming the identity of Fred Noonan, Alex is about to become the navigator of the doomed flight that was supposed to be a monumental moment in history as Amelia Earhart attempted to be the first woman to fly around the world, but which instead turned to tragedy.

Aboard the plane during its fateful flight, Alex might find finally the answers of what happened. But he's going to have to convince the world that he's Fred Noonan first..



As suspicions escalate can Alex maintain his cover or will Amelia uncover the deception?



And even if Alex can convince everyone, he still has to figure out how to become a navigator.
Recreate the real-life flight route and confront whatever danger lurks ahead..
detailed_description:
On July 2nd, 1937 the U.S. Coast Guard cutter Itasca received the last recorded words of Amelia Earhart. She was never seen or heard of again. Her Lockheed E-10 was lost with her. No wreckage or any fragments were ever found despite a 250,000 square mile search the size of Texas being conducted by the United States Navy.
On July 2nd 1937, Amelia Earhart and her plane disappeared forever.

“We are on the line 157-337 flying north and south.”



Assuming the identity of Fred Noonan, Alex is about to become the navigator of the doomed flight that was supposed to be a monumental moment in history as Amelia Earhart attempted to be the first woman to fly around the world, but which instead turned to tragedy.

Aboard the plane during its fateful flight, Alex might find finally the answers of what happened. But he's going to have to convince the world that he's Fred Noonan first..



As suspicions escalate can Alex maintain his cover or will Amelia uncover the deception?



And even if Alex can convince everyone, he still has to figure out how to become a navigator.
Recreate the real-life flight route and confront whatever danger lurks ahead..

short_description: What happened to Amelia Earhart and Fred Noonan? Where did their plane go? A mystery that remains to this day, perhaps Alex and Professor Emit could have the answer..
